content:
I am a first-year doctoral student at Duke University advised by Prof. Sina Farsiu. Now I work closely with Dr. Kai Li, Dr. Yulun Zhang, and Dr. Dengping Fang. Previously, I received my master degree at Tsinghua University under the supervision of Prof. Xiu Li and obtained my bachelor degree at Nanjing University of Posts and Telecommunications under the guidance of Prof. Hu Zhu and Dr. Guoxia Xu.
My research interests revolve around the intersection of computer vision, biomedical image analysis, and machine learning. Specifically, I emphasize the utilization of prior knowledge to augment the robustness and generalization capabilities of computer vision algorithms.
I’m open to any kinds of collaboration. Please feel free to contact me directly through email.
Email: chunminghe19990224@gmail.com or chunming.he@duke.edu
